snippet: The promised “spectacle of raw shame” comes off more like a faded reproduction in “Hypnotik: The Seer Will Doctor You Now.”
abstract: Jason Zinoman reviews performance of play Hypnotik: The Seer Will Doctor You Now, written by Colm O'Shea, Marie Glancy O'Shea and Ildiko Nemeth, at the Theater for the New City.
lead_paragraph: The promised “spectacle of raw shame” comes off more like a faded reproduction in “Hypnotik: The Seer Will Doctor You Now.”

headline.seo: ‘Hypnotik’ at Theater for the New City - Review
headline.main: Plumbing the Depths, With a Little Help
